医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
数字化身可以缓解精神病患者令人不安的声音带来的痛苦AVATAR-Extend 疗法证明可以有效缓解精神病声音带来的痛苦，促进情绪和幸福感的持久改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Digital-avatars-may-ease-distress-from-troubling-voices-in-psychosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Digital-avatars-may-ease-distress-from-troubling-voices-in-psychosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a46948a-18e3-4b3d-8ea5-f988e1eaecde Tue, 29 Oct 2024 10:09:00 -0400 Digital avatars may ease distress from troubling voices in psychosis
人工智能驱动的化身将在印度和埃塞俄比亚进行心理健康试验人工智能驱动的数字化身将在印度和埃塞俄比亚对那些头脑中听到声音的人进行试验，研究人员正在尝试调整心理健康治疗，以便在资源匮乏的环境中有效地使用它们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/AI-powered-avatars-set-for-mental-health-Trials-in-India-and-Ethiopia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/AI-powered-avatars-set-for-mental-health-Trials-in-India-and-Ethiopia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8fbe15c-fb7f-40d2-8748-1cec8fb33d5c Tue, 29 Oct 2024 09:22:00 -0400 AI-powered avatars set for mental health trials in India and Ethiopia
新研究调查儿童之家提供的护理的有效性伦敦金斯顿大学、国家儿童局和 Ofsted 的一项新研究将调查儿童之家所提供护理的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/New-study-to-investigate-the-efficiency-of-care-provided-in-childrens-homes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/New-study-to-investigate-the-efficiency-of-care-provided-in-childrens-homes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=679a525a-c839-4c38-8eb7-6a8d8e0242a8 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 09:18:00 -0400 New study to investigate the effectiveness of care provided in children's homes
研究揭示了影响 CAR-T 细胞成功的内在因素Josep Carreras 白血病研究所的研究人员发现，varni-cel（一种用于 B-ALL 患者的 CAR-T 输注产品）的疗效高度依赖于 CAR-T 细胞本身的内在特征及其在患者体内的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Research-uncovers-intrinsic-factors-influencing-CAR-T-cell-success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Research-uncovers-intrinsic-factors-influencing-CAR-T-cell-success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97ed4f3c-88a3-442a-bc8c-fa1b96635b80 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 09:03:00 -0400 Research uncovers intrinsic factors influencing CAR-T cell success
创新方法有望利用超薄膜快速诊断癌症有数十亿个微小的细胞物质包，称为细胞外囊泡 (EV)，它们由细胞产生并释放到每个人的血液、唾液和其他体液中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Innovative-method-promises-quick-cancer-diagnosis-using-ultrathin-membranes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Innovative-method-promises-quick-cancer-diagnosis-using-ultrathin-membranes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bad7f2e8-b3ac-4513-b129-f623d1e9146c Tue, 29 Oct 2024 08:48:01 -0400 Innovative method promises quick cancer diagnosis using ultrathin membranes
研究发现六种癌症易感基因deCODE Genetics/Amgen 的科学家及其合作者发现了六种新基因，这些基因具有与癌症风险相关的罕见种系变异。该研究结果今天发表在《自然遗传学》杂志上，标题为“基于罕见种系变异的基因负荷测试识别出六种癌症易感性基因”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Study-uncovers-6-cancer-susceptibility-genes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Study-uncovers-6-cancer-susceptibility-genes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c749d21-b03b-4a24-9ceb-2112ea7d0b0f Tue, 29 Oct 2024 08:41:52 -0400 Study uncovers six cancer susceptibility genes
维生素 D 水平低与妊娠期和产后抑郁风险增加相关研究表明，维生素 D 水平低可能会导致孕妇焦虑和抑郁，因此强调了充足补充的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Low-vitamin-D-linked-with-increased-depression-risk-in-pregnancy-and-after-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Low-vitamin-D-linked-with-increased-depression-risk-in-pregnancy-and-after-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3530e125-6304-4351-851b-0097315ad3b6 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 07:59:00 -0400 Low vitamin D associated with increased depression risk in pregnancy and after birth
MGI 和 OncoDNA 联手为实验室提供简化的 NGS 工作流程，用于在临床实践中实施综合基因组分析 (CGP) OncoDEEP® 试剂盒华大智造（华大智造或其子公司，统称华大智造）是一家致力于构建推动生命科学创新的核心工具和技术的公司，今天宣布与专注于精准医疗的基因组和治疗诊断公司OncoDNA达成合作。用于治疗癌症和遗传疾病的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/MGI-and-OncoDNA-join-forces-to-offer-laboratories-a-streamlined-NGS-workflow-for-implementing-Compressive-Genomic-Profiling- (CGP)-OncoDEEPc2ae-Kit-in-clinical-practice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/MGI-and-OncoDNA-join-forces-to-offer-laboratories-a-streamlined-NGS-workflow-for-implementing-Compressive-Genomic-Profiling- (CGP)-OncoDEEPc2ae-Kit-in-clinical-practice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7b33368-7524-4646-872b-12ede50d60d2 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 07:52:00 -0400 MGI and OncoDNA join forces to offer laboratories a streamlined NGS workflow for implementing Comprehensive Genomic Profiling (CGP) OncoDEEP® Kit in clinical practice
维生素 D 可能是控制 2 型糖尿病的缺失环节吗？最近的研究表明维生素 D 在 2 型糖尿病管理中的作用正在不断演变，有证据表明它可以改善血糖水平并减少与糖尿病相关的炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Could-vitamin-D-be-the-missing-link-in-managing-type-2-diabetes-Recent-study-weighs-in.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Could-vitamin-D-be-the-missing-link-in-managing-type-2-diabetes-Recent-study-weighs-in.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5da4d614-c140-4a5e-837c-42b939bd4e2e Tue, 29 Oct 2024 07:33:00 -0400 Could vitamin D be the missing link in managing type 2 diabetes? Recent study weighs in
万斯错误地将乡村医院关闭归咎于非法移民最近在威斯康星州举行的一次总统竞选集会上，参议员 JD 万斯（俄亥俄州共和党人）被问到，面对医院关闭的情况，特朗普政府将如何保护农村医疗保健的获取，例如今年欧克莱尔和奇珀瓦福尔斯的两家医院关闭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Vance-wrongly-blames-rural-hospital-closures-on-immigrants-in-the-country-illegally.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Vance-wrongly-blames-rural-hospital-closures-on-immigrants-in-the-country-illegally.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c55d027a-89b9-4c0b-99bb-9d2b93bbf392 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 07:07:05 -0400 Vance wrongly blames rural hospital closures on immigrants in the country illegally
